front.title: Scenarios and Requirements for Layer 2 Autonomic Control Planes

abstract.t: This document discusses scenarios and requirements for Autonomic Control Planes (ACPs) constructed and secured at Layer 2. These would be alternatives to an ACP constructed and secured at the network layer. A secure ACP is required as the substrate for the Generic Autonomic Signaling Protocol (GRASP) used by Autonomic Service Agents.
